Message - Class in peersim.kademlia
Message class provide all functionalities to magage the various messages, principally LOOKUP messages (messages from application level sender destinated to another application level).
Message() - Constructor for class peersim.kademlia.Message
Creates an empty message by using default values (message type = MSG_LOOKUP and new String("") value for the body of the message)
Message(int) - Constructor for class peersim.kademlia.Message
Create a message with specific type and empty body
Message(int, Object) - Constructor for class peersim.kademlia.Message
Creates a message with specific type and body
